text: Se engel brohte þis gewrit of heofonum and lede hit on uppan Sanctus Petrus weofud on Rome.
Se þe þis gebed singð on cyrcean, þonne forstent hit him sealtera sealma.
And se þe hit singð æt his endedæge, þonne forstent hit him huselgang.
And hit mæg eac wið æghwilcum uncuþum yfele, ægðer ge fleogendes ge farendes.
Gif hit innon bið, sing þis on wæter, syle him drincan.
Gif hit þonne utan si, sing hit on fersce buteran and smere mid þæt lic.
And sing þis ylce gebed on niht ær þu to þinum reste ga, þonne gescylt þe God wið unswefnum þe nihternessum on menn <becumað>, oð ende.
